series.name: Asia Cup
series.description: Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka in Bangladesh

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

milestones.description: Aminul Islam has broken the record for most ODIs (16) as captain for BAN, going past Akram Khan
Pakistan's 234-run win against Bangladesh is the largest margin of victory in terms of runs in ODIs, beating 192-run win against Sri Lanka
Khaled Mahmud has conceded the most runs in an innings (81) in ODIs for BAN, going past Sheikh Salahuddin's record of 80
Inzamam-ul-Haq has scored 59 fifty-plus scores in ODIs, the most for PAK breaking Javed Miandad's record

stories.title: Bangladesh v Pakistan, Asia Cup, Statistical Highlights
stories.summary: It was the 1599th ODI in cricket history

stories.title: Pakistan crush Bangladesh before vital clash
stories.summary:
After the run feast that happened in the early part of the day, there
was nothing much to look forward to as Pakistan took the field
